name: Beomjun Gil
description: Hey! I’m a software engineer at UNNI in Seoul, South Korea.
greeting: Hey! I’m a software engineer at UNNI in Seoul, South Korea.
mainAboutMe: I enjoy understanding the essence of a problem and the process of solving it. I like setting high standards with my team to achieve better results, and I’m passionate about making real changes without missing any details.
recommendPeopleDescription: These are wonderful people who worked with me at certain moments in my life, helping me learn and grow. I proudly recommend those who shaped who I am today.
translationPendingTitle: This post has not been translated yet.
translationPendingDescription: I am currently learning languages with AI and working on the translation, so please wait a little longer.
gadgetsDescription: Yes, May the Apple be with me.
